H0.text: Herman Van Rompuy became first Permanent President of what. European Council

H1.text: Herman Van Rompuy became first Permanent President of what. European Commission

H2.text: Herman Van Rompuy became first Permanent President of what. Eurogroup

H3.text: Herman Van Rompuy became first Permanent President of what. Euco

A4.text: Following the ratification of the treaty in December 2009, the European Council elected the then-Prime Minister of Belgium Herman Van Rompuy as its first permanent president
